Project of projects...

For this project I want to do a number of things all encompassed into a unified artefact. Subjects / areas of investigation are as follows:

  • Working with some of the more esoteric parts of the SVG spec with regards to image filtering and masking, and manipulating those masks and filter with JavaScript.
  • Working with an intersting magazine style layout approach written about on CSS-Tricks (url to come).
  • Working with variable fonts.
  • the whole kit and kaboodle should be accessible, and be enhanced progressively...
  • Utilize CSS custom properties...
  • follow principles set out in Every Layout

so yeah. lots to cover... but it doesnt have to be super complex, just touch all of the above in some small way

A challenge I keep running up against is scaling SVGs. Seems counterintuitive since the first word in SVG is Scalable...
